titles.title: Charitable Tax Relief Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent law the tax-free distributions from individual retirement plans for charitable purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/19/2007--Introduced. Charitable Tax Relief Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the exclusion from gross income of distributions from individual retirement accounts made for charitable purposes.
